Total_Links:
FY25 Results:Bank of Baroda announced its financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2025, on May 6, 2025.

Dividend:The Board recommended a dividend of Rs 8.35 per equity share for FY25. June 6, 2025, was set as the record date for dividend payment.

Post-Results Impact:Following the FY25 results announcement,Business Today reportedon May 6, 2025, that Bank of Baroda's shares slumped 15%.

Peon Recruitment 2025:Bank of Baroda released the recruitment notification for the Peon position on May 2nd, 2025. A total of 500 vacancies were announced for Office Assistant (Peon). The application window was open from May 3rd to May 23rd, 2025.

Age Limit:Candidates applying for the Peon position were required to be between 18 and 26 years old as of May 1st, 2025, and must have passed the 10th standard.

Salary:The starting salary for the Office Assistant position was Rs. 19,500/-, along with allowances and benefits.

Positive Pay System:Upstox reportedon May 30, 2025, that the threshold for mandatory Positive Pay Confirmation for cheques was reduced to ₹4 lakh and above, effective May 1st, 2025. This was a phased reduction from the previous limit of ₹5 lakh, aimed at strengthening fraud prevention efforts.

Positive Pay Confirmation:This system, introduced by Bank of Baroda in January 2021 as per RBI guidelines, requires customers to submit cheque details in advance for verification before processing.
